name: Hexes Board Game: Hive conquer
description:
Hexes is a custom-made implementation of the board game Hive, a game remotely resembling chess.

Play online or offline!

The goal is to surround the enemy's queen bee from all six sides of these hexagons. Each piece has different mechanics!
